data.eml:eml: The assassin bug genus Haematoloecha in Taiwan, with notes on species occurring in the neighbouring areas (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Ectrichodiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rédei, Dávid, Tsai, Jing-Fu (2012): The assassin bug genus Haematoloecha in Taiwan, with notes on species occurring in the neighbouring areas (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Ectrichodiinae). Zootaxa 3332: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281266
